instructions: Turn the broiler on to 450 degrees F and put a rack at the closest setting to the broiler.
Slice the eggplant into 1/2 inch rounds. Drizzle 1 Tbsp of olive oil on a baking sheet and spread into a thin layer with a brush.
For each slice of eggplant, brush one side with olive oil, then place it on the baking sheet with the un-oiled side down.

Sprinkle eggplant with salt and a generous helping of pepper. Broil for 5 min on each side. Timing will vary depending on your oven so do not walk away during this step. Check the eggplants frequently.
